_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: NodeJS [1.1.45]
author: contact@inetol.net
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
startup:
if [ {{DEBUG}} = 1 ]; then bash; fi; if [ {{AUTOUPIN}} = 1 ]; then if [ {{MODE}} = 0 ]; then npm install --production; else 
if [ {{YARNV}} = 2 ]; then yarn set version berry; fi; yarn install; fi; fi; if [ {{MODE}} = 0 ]; then node {{FLAGS}} {{FILE}}; else 
if [ {{YARNV}} = 2 ]; then yarn set version berry; else yarn set version latest; fi; yarn node {{FLAGS}} {{FILE}}; fi

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git node-gyp curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool build-essential glibc; apt autoremove -y; apt autoclean; apt clean; clear; echo "Nexus - NodeJS EdgeSlot [V1.1.45]"

variables.name: Use YARN?
variables.description: Use YARN instead of NPM. It's strongly recommended to leave this as default if you don't know what are you doing.

variables.name: YARN version
variables.description: If YARN is enabled, you need to specify which version is used. Recomended using the version "2".

variables.name: Auto [Update / Install] Packages
variables.description: Allow NPM or YARN installing or updating the packages when starting the slot.
